title: Tripped
text: You are knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.

title: Bruised ego
text: You can attack no other target for 1d4 rounds (or until the target is dead).

title: Awkward attack
text: You take a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.

title: Tiring attack
text: You are %STATUS-FATIGUED=fatigued%.

title: Upset tummy
text: You are %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d4 rounds.

title: I bit my tug
text: You take 1 point of %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Muscle tear
text: You take 1d4 points of %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Stinging failure
text: You take 1d6 points of %NONLETHAL-DAMAGE=nonlethal damage% and a -2 penalty on attack rolls with that attack for 1d4 rounds.

title: Smash the floor
text: You kick up dust that %STATUS-BLINDED=blinds% you for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort negates%).

title: He's sharp
text: You take 1d6 points of damage + your Str modifier.

title: Torn muscle
text: You take 1 point of %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-DRAIN=drain% (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort negates%).

title: Got too close
text: Your attack hits the target but the target may start a grapple against you for free.

title: Off balance
text: You can only take a move action next round.

title: He bit your fist
text: The target deals bite damage to you.

title: Fist meets face
text: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

title: Out of position
text: You cannot use this attack for 1 round.

title: Wide open
text: You are %STATUS-FLAT-FOOTED=flat-footed% for 1 round.

title: Bleeding fist
text: You take 1d6 points of %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Twisted
text: You become %STATUS-ENTANGLED=entangled% in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself.

title: Stop hitting yourself
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

title: Just a taste
text: Your attack hits an ally adjacent to you or the target.

title: Overextend
text: You provoke an attack of opportunity from all adjacent opponents.

title: Frustration
text: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round.

title: Broken tooth
text: You take a -2 penalty on attack rolls for 1d6 minutes.

title: Not the weak point
text: Your enemy's armor takes 1d6 %OBJECT-DAMAGE=points of damage%. You take 1d6 points of damage and cannot use that attack for 1d3 rounds.

title: That tastes awful!
text: If this was a bite attack, you are %STATUS-NAUSEATED=nauseated% for 1d6 rounds.

title: Broke a nail
text: You take 1d4 points of damage and you cannot use this attack %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Sprain
text: You take 1d4 points of %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Overexertion
text: You are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted% (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort negates%).

title: Don't pick at it
text: You take 1 point of %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: We have a wiener
text: You fall %STATUS-UNCONSCIOUS=unconscious% for 1d6 round (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Will negates%).

title: Whiff
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

title: Jam a finger
text: Your target takes normal damage, you take double damage.

title: Caught your attack
text: The target may attempt to trip, bull rush or overrun you (target's choice).

title: Pins & needles
text: You are %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d6 rounds.

title: Great roar
text: You are %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed% (DC 15 Heal Check).

title: Head, meet wall
text: You are %STATUS-DAZED=dazed% for 1d3 rounds.

title: Ferocious fumble
text: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

title: Sneeze!
text: You are %STATUS-DAZED=dazed% for 1 round.

title: Ingrown nail
text: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.

title: Whirlwind of shame
text: Your attack deals damage to all targets adjacent to you except the original target.

title: Battered
text: You take a -2 penalty on skill checks and saves for 1d4 hours.

title: Winds of change
text: You threaten no squares for 1d6 rounds.

title: Unintentional move
text: Move 10 feet in a random direction provoking attacks of opportunity as normal.

title: Eye strain
text: You are %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round.

title: Hangnail
text: If this was a claw attack, slam or unarmed strike, you cannot use that attack for 1d6 rounds.

title: Brutal collision
text: Your attack hits, but you are %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 2 rounds (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort save% reduces the stun to 1 round).

title: Pinched nerve
text: If you had reach greater than 5 feet, it is reduced to 5 feet for 3 rounds.

title: Overthink it
text: Your target's armor and natural armor bonuses are doubled against you for 3 rounds.

title: Punctured foot
text: You take 1d3 points of damage and your speed is halved %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Bone bruise
text: You take 1d2 point of %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Bad headbutt
text: You are %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort negates%).
